thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 6 of 178
thread.title: customer

author: customer
title: customer
text:
I only recently joined this web site and have already completed my first house sit. It was a marvellous experience and have 4 other house sits booked using up all my available annual leave.
I really enjoyed meeting the owners and spending time in their home and best of all I got to know 2 lovely dogs who appreciated my time and attention and several cats who were no trouble.
I look forward to more house sits with confidence thanks to the great web site.
